page.title: 01Folds of the North Downs
page.content: This area still contains many acres of outstanding natural beauty, it is mainly farmland top fruit, hops arable and large tracts of coppiced woodland, the whole,being traversed by narrow winding roads. With the advancement of mechanisation on the land and subsequently less people employued , the many farm cottages and houses and buildings such as oasts and barns have been bought by people from outside the area, converted into residential property but commuting daily to work in nearby towns or London. Residential areas are so scattered there is virtually no public transport and village Post Offices are hard pressed to stay open, but pubs do very well with the many visiters atracted to the area.
